For example:

* best - compassionate
* superb - thoughtful
* excellent - encouraging
* terrible - uplifting
* awful - inspiring
* worst - motivating
* horrible - empowering

I hope this alternative approach meets your requirements. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
